meanings.definition: Something designed to preserve the memory of a person, event, etc.
meanings.sent1: The town built memorials to honor the soldiers who fought bravely in the war.
meanings.sent2: Visiting memorials can help us remember important moments in history.
meanings.sent3: The memorials in the park always remind me to appreciate the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a memorial to the joy she brought into our lives.
meanings.sent5: The grand memorial stood tall, symbolizing the unity of the community.
